findings.title: Liability cap carve-outs may negate protection
findings.rationale: Liability caps that exclude indemnity, confidentiality, or IP claims often negate the practical benefit of the cap entirely.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...5. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY Each party's liability is limited to the total contract value, except for indemnification obligations....

4. INDEMNIFICATION
Each party shall indemnify the other for claims arising from its own gross negligence or willful misconduct, capped at annual contract value.

5. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
Each party's liability is limited to the total contract value, except for indemnification obligations.

6. TERM AND TERMINATION

findings.title: Specific governing law or venue
findings.rationale: Governing law and venue choices can affect enforcement cost and strategy.

9. DISPUTE RESOLUTION
Disputes shall be resolved through good faith discussion between the parties.

10. GOVERNING LAW
This Agreement is governed by the laws of the State of Washington.

11. ATTORNEYS' FEES
Each party shall pay its own attorneys' fees and costs.
